jobs_results.title: Enterprise Architect
jobs_results.description:
Summary of Role:

Do you have a passion for architecting complex IT solutions? We are seeking a talented Solutions Architect to join our growing Multi-Service Integration organization. In this role, you will be an integral part of the client service team, solutioning large, multi-tower engagements across multiple business units.

A solution architect is responsible for the design of one or more applications or services within an organization, and is typically part of a solution development team. He or she must have a balanced mix of technical and business skills, and will often work with an enterprise architect or technical architects for strategic direction. The main focus is on the technical decisions being made regarding the solution and how they impact the business outcomes.

You will craft top-notch solutions for our clients’ transformation and outsourcing requirements. You will define and drive business-IT solutions that use innovative business processes, architectural and... technical frameworks to provide client partners with viable, high value solutions to complex business problems. Our solutions are typically a combination of Digital, BPO, applications development, applications management and infrastructure services. This elite opportunity requires prior professional experience as a solution architect, with a consistent track record of running and winning deals.

Focus of an Enterprise Architect:
• How technology can be used to solve a given business problem
• Which framework, platform, or tech-stack can be used to create a solution
• How the application will look, what the modules will be, and how they interact with each other
• How things will scale for the future and how they will be maintained
• Figuring out the risk in third-party frameworks/platforms
• Finding a solution to a business problem.

Role Responsibilities:
• Drive solutioning for complex deals involving multiple service lines and technical disciplines as part of RFI, RFP and informal deal processes.
• Lead a multi-functional team of tower authorities across their respective domains.
• Work closely with clients, intermediaries and internal Cognizant technical domain authorities to build high impact solutions
• Define solution vision and direction building on commonalities and benefits across lines of business and technologies
• Envision a transformation roadmap that aligns with the strategic and tactical direction of the partner client
• Drive the translation of complex business initiatives into creative and innovate business-technology solutions and ensure consistency across traditional solution boundaries
• Work with Business Stakeholders and Project Managers to understand inefficiencies in clients’ existing business processes and applications and recommend solutions

Skills & Experience:
• 15+ years of experience in IT Consulting or in an enterprise architect role with a minimum of 2 years of experience in at least two of the following: Infrastructure Services, BPO, Digital, Applications Development and Maintenance
• Strong knowledge in Banking & Financial Services domain. Specific experience in wealth and institutional banking will be an advantage
• Must have demonstrated good consulting/ architecture experience in one or more digital areas (cloud, AI/ML, Analytics, IoT, Blockchain)
• Proven experience planning, designing, and implementing large scale business-IT solutions
• Proficient in Agile and DevOps methodologies and tools
• Experience in multiple technology platforms and domains is desirable
• Certified in TOGAF 9 or similar is desirable
• Ability to present complex delivery and technical concepts to the clients during white-boarding and orals sessions
• Ability to articulate the value of technical capabilities to C-suite audience
• Excellent communication and presentation skills, both verbal and written
• Ability to operate with ambiguity and program manage the solution build process
• Strong leadership skills, decision-making and problem solving abilities.
• Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or related Engineering subjects

#LI-CTSAPAC

Employee Status : Full Time Employee

Shift : Day Job

Travel : No

Job Posting : Apr 19 2021

About Cognizant
Cognizant (Nasdaq-100: CTSH) is one of the world's leading professional services companies, transforming clients' business, operating and technology models for the digital era. Our unique industry-based, consultative approach helps clients envision, build and run more innovative and efficient businesses. Headquartered in the U.S., Cognizant is ranked 194 on the Fortune 500 and is consistently listed among the most admired companies in the world. Learn how Cognizant helps clients lead with digital at www.cognizant.com or follow us @Cognizant

jobs_results.title: Cloud Architect (pre Sales & Solution)
jobs_results.via: via MNC Jobs Singapore | MNC Jobs In Singapore
jobs_results.description:
Key Responsibilities:
• Prepare technical proposals and work on sizing and estimation
• Should be able to independently work on Cloud Operations and Cloud Management Proposal.
• Work within Cloud Practice to provide Design, Migration, Governance, Operation and Cloud Native solutions
• Prepare end-to-end solutions for Managed services delivery models for clouds
• Drive technical discussions and explain solutions and product options to meet customer needs
• Drive Thought leadership and support evangelization activities working with Sales and Consulting teams

Required Technical skills and Experience
• Candidates must have 15 + years of overall experience helping large enterprises through their #Cloud journey .
• Cloud certification along with deep hands on experience is must for this role.
• Experience across any platform like #AWS Certified #Google Cloud Certified #Azure Certification is Critical to be successful in this role
• Cloud Governance and Operations deals on Azure, AWS, GCP... and Multi and Hybrid cloud – Assessment, Design Architecture, deciding and defining NFR and prepare roadmap to cloud, considering and taking care of dependencies
• Working as a technical leader alongside customer business, development and infrastructure team to define cloud adoption approach
• Should be familiar with Microsoft and AWS Cloud Adoption Framework and ITILv3 service Delivery methodology.
• Should have hands on experience of working on Cloud
• Should have working experience on SaaS/PaaS and Data services on Cloud
• Understand and evolve sizing and pricing mechanism and BOM for partner solutions
• Should have experience in Containerized solutions – Docker, Kuberenets
• Ability to provide holistic and right scale cloud solutions that addresses scalability, availability, service continuity (DR), performance and security requirements

jobs_results.title: Solution Architect/Pre-Sales Engineer/Network Solution Consultant (Up to S$8.5K)
jobs_results.description:
Your New Role
We are looking for a qualified Solution Consultant/Pre-Sales to help our clients reform their operations and support their business by providing intuitive guidance. You will be an important ally to every organization who wants to invest in change and improvement and needs help as to where and how. The goal is to contribute to the clients’ long lasting success so that our reputation can expand along with our clientele.

What Will You Do
• Design reliable and effective solutions to meet the needs of the clients’ business
• Respond to RFI, RFP, RFQ and tenders with quality submission
• Working closely with the sales team on proposals and pitches for business
• Proactively scopes the technical solution required to address customer requirements, assesses customers’ met and unmet needs, and recommends solutions that optimize value for both the customer and company
• Develop proposed solution and updates of the solutions designed for customers
• Work closely with the Sales... implementation, Support team as well as partners to develop comprehensive solution and to support the customers ongoing services and implementation
• Able to present, explain, and articulate the proposed solution to customers
• Demonstrate proof of value when needed to demonstrate solution and feature to customer

What You Will Need To Succeed
• Diploma/Degree in any IT/Engineering/Telco related discipline
• Min. 5 years of experience in a Networking/Technical Position role
• Min. 5 years of experience in a Presales for Network / Security / Network Security / Systems / UC / DC / OT
• Vendor Certification such as CCNP / CCIE
• Cisco trained will be highly advantageous
• Experience in designing of medium, large, and complex tender/project
• Excellent interpersonal, presentation and business writing skills
• Willing to learn and adopt new or unfamiliar technology and products

jobs_results.title: Cloud Infrastructure Architect at OCBC Bank
jobs_results.description:
Cloud Infrastructure Architect at OCBC Bank

Job Description

Descriptionat Ocbc, We Do Not Just Merely Provide A Working Space. We Create A Culture That Allows You To Flourish. Across The Bank, Our Leaders Encourage Fresh Ideas, Reward Continuous Learning And Most Importantly, We Care For Not Just You But Also Your Family. We Recognize Your Drive, Passion And Talent. We Will Bring Out The Best In You And Empower You To Excel. Fulfil Your Life Goals And Career Ambitions With Us. Here at Group Operations & Technology, We Are On A Digital Transformation Journey To Push The Boundaries Of Banking Operations And Technology, Applications Development And Infrastructure By Continuously Challenging And Improving The Way We Work. We Want To Make Banking Seamless For Our Customers By Creating A Culture Focused On Creating Excellent Customer And Employee Experience. Do Come And Join Us Today! We Are Seeking Self Motivated, Highly Experienced, And Dedicated Team Players Who Are Passionate About... Building Digital Infrastructure. The Cloud Infrastructure Architect Will Be Working With An Infrastructure Modernization Team To Design And Implement Ocbc’S Vision Of A Digital Infrastructure. He Will Design Ocbc’S Multi Cloud Across On Premise And Hybrid Cloud Infrastructure, Leveraging New Technology Stacks To Support Modern Application And Ai Driven IT Operations. Responsibilities Develop Architectural Standards And Technical Design Of Modern Technology Infrastructure Stacks Which Include (Not Limited To) Hybrid Cloud, Aiops Define Roadmap Of New Capabilities To Deliver Multi Cloud Strategy Set And Maintain Architectural Standards, Design Documents, And Governance Framework Collaborate And Work With The Various Stakeholder To Develop Technical Solutions, Plans And Configuration For New Technology Infrastructure Stacks Job Qualifications Possesses at Least A Bachelor'S Degree In Computer Science/Information Technology Or Equivalent Solid Experience On Large Scale Infrastructure Private And Public Cloud Design, Build And Migration Projects Minimum 5 Years Hands On Experience On Designing And Building Both On Premise And Hybrid Cloud Infrastructure, Aiops, Infrastructure As Code, Devops Toolset at Least 5 Years Of Working Experience In Cloud Technology Such As Vmware Cloud Foundation, Microfocus Cloud Management Platform, Aws, Azure, Gcp, Terraform, Ansible, Chef, Puppet, Openshift, Kafka, Redis, Etc Demonstrate Strong Knowledge In Technology Infrastructure Domain Such As Virtual Server Technologies, Networking, Internet Protocols, Scripting & Monitoring Tools. Possess Good Technical Knowledge In Implementing, Troubleshoot, Performance Tuning Of Hardware, Operating System And System Services. Possessing Vcdx Cma, Aws Architect Professional, Azure Solution Architect Expert And Or Google’S Professional Cloud Architect Certification Will Be An Advantage. Strong Analytical Skill And Creative In Problem Solving. Excellent Command Of Written And Spoken English. A Good Team Player And Able To Work Effectively at All Levels Of An Organization With The Ability To Influence Others To Move Towards Consensus. Primary Location Singapore Job Information Technology Organization Group Operations & Technology Division Schedule Permanent Full Time Job Posting 26 Nov 2020, 10:23:22 Pm Show More

jobs_results.title: Senior/Solutions Architect (Digital)
jobs_results.description:
EPAM is committed to providing our global team of more than 41,150 EPAMers with inspiring careers from day one. EPAMers think creatively and lead with passion and honesty. Our people are the source of our success. We value collaboration, work in partnership with our customers, and strive for the highest standards of excellence. In today’s market conditions, we’re supporting operations for hundreds of clients around the world remotely. No matter where you are located, you’ll join a dedicated, diverse community that will help you discover your fullest potential.
Striving for excellence is in our DNA. Since 1993, we have been helping the world’s leading companies imagine, design, engineer, and deliver software and digital experiences that change the world. We are more than just specialists, we are experts.

DESCRIPTION
You are strategic, resilient, engaging with people and a natural self-starter. You have a passion for solving complex problems. If this sounds like you, this could be the... perfect opportunity to join EPAM as a Senior/Solutions Architect - Digital.
Responsibilities
• Engage with customer business stakeholders to discover opportunities and pain points
• Lead and challenge team members and customers to create great strategies and solutions
• Support and at times, lead pre-sales initiatives identifying high-level architecture and product selections
• Map customer vision & requirements to specific products and components
• Consult on existing solutions, assess products and define technology roadmaps for clients
• Act as a digital technology advocate and work to remove business, technical and political roadblocks
• Mentor and coach clients and team members to enhance their ability to deliver on the agreed upon tech strategy
• Ensure the strategy is actionable and well documented for a clean handover to implementation
• Assemble a team of EPAM analysts, designers & engineers and deliver a proof of concept or MVP to drive the point home and ensure a long-lasting and fruitful customer relationship
• Ensure projects are delivered within the agreed schedule and budget while ensuring quality
• Deliver clear and consistent communications within projects and across stakeholders of all levels
• Lead meetings, design activities, review sessions and retrospectives
• Manage expectations on a daily basis to keep everyone aligned
• Participate and drive internal and external technology and engineering webinars and events
• Manage a team of experience technologists; support the growth and maturity of our emerging engineer academies within Singapore
• Encourage a culture of experimentation and innovation through new tech
Requirements
• A Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science/information technology or equivalent qualification
• Solutions Architect: Min 12 years of experience with at least 5 years of experience as a Solutions Architect
• Senior Solutions Architect: Min 15 years of experience with at least 8-9 years of experience as a Solutions Architect
• Primary career focus on some or all areas of data & analytics, marketing technology and the latest digital technology trends
• Ability to facilitate and drive strategy discussion
• Ability to participate in and influence solution design discussions
• Ability to keep your cool & adapt quickly when facing unexpected challenges
• Experience managing medium to large-scale software/technology initiatives
• Experience managing projects using Agile methodologies
• Technical background for understanding technical concepts and discussions
• Knowledge of techniques such a SWOT analysis a plus
• Awareness of marketing technology and data & analytic technology trends
• Desire to learn & expand your comfort zone whenever a new technological trend arises
• Experience managing and motivating junior developers and technical analysts
• A keen interest in and passion for following future tech trends, physical/digital, etc; experimenting and driving innovation with technologies such as hardware, IoT, robotics, VR/AR, etc
We offer
• Friendly team and enjoyable working environment
• Work-life balance and flexible schedule
• Online training library, mentoring, career development and potential partial grant of certification
• Unlimited access to LinkedIn learning solutions
• Referral bonuses
• Compensation for sick leave and paid time off
• Opportunities for self-realization

about the company

about the job

skills and experience required

To apply online please use the apply function, alternatively you may contact Anson at 9025 4389.

jobs_results.title: AWS Solutions Architect
jobs_results.description:
Responsibilities:
Communicate with clients and determine their needs with technical details.
Partner with the account management team to engage small to medium businesses and enterprise clients on discussions, design and recommend solutions based on clients' needs.
Identify and mitigate possible risks and design solutions based on AWS best practices and industry standards.
Define clear scope, roles & responsibilities, estimate effort and success criteria of proposed solutions, even if under limited technical knowhow in the solution.
Perform POC projects (with clients), identify new possibilities with new AWS services and emerging technologies.
Enable internal and external teams in AWS best practices, throughout the project implementation stage or public seminar. Requirements:
Passionate in AWS Cloud technologies
Candidates should possess at least a bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technology or related technical degree
AWS Solutions Architect –... Associate certification required.
Demonstrated ability to adapt to new technologies and learn quickly.
Strong communication, presentation skill; outspoken and verbally capable to communicate your thoughts/ideas clearly and precisely
Presentation skills with a high degree of comfort with both large and small audiences.
Strong written communication skills.
Experience with design/implementation/consulting distributed applications, or perform system administrator role for infrastructure services such as server, storage, network and database
Experience in application architecture, infrastructure architecture, database architecture or networking
Professional experience architecting/operating solutions built on AWS.
Intermediate/advanced knowledge of the AWS services, market segments, customer base, and industry verticals.
Experience working within software development or Internet-related industries.
Experience in software development life cycle, waterfall, and agile approach is a plus
Experience in enabling DevOps, Cloud adoption, backup and DR on the cloud.
Willing to travel around regional offices. Whats in it for you?
Overseas training/development opportunity
Emerging technology stack enablement
Attractive remuneration package and benefits
5-day work with flexible working hour
Candidates with more experience will be considered as Senior Solutions Architect

jobs_results.title: Enterprise Application Architect
Cloud Solution Architect Manager
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for a talented individual to lead a team of deeply technical Apps & Infra/Data and AI Cloud Solution Architects (CSA) to drive growth of Azure Services for a set of Enterprise accounts across different industries. Key responsibilities include: This CSA Manager role will directly manage a team of full-time employee Apps & Infra/Data and AI CSA that will cover Enterprise customers in their respective territory. This is an exciting role that will help fuel Azure Customer success through customer retention and growth.

Responsibilities

Key responsibilities include:
• Hire, on-board, develop, coach, mentor and evaluate CSA. Set a clear bar for excellence. Build a high performing team that will be diverse and inclusive
• Must possess exceptional cross-team collaboration and communication. Partner with all required Microsoft stakeholders in the subsidiary to drive CSA role clarity, account coverage, project assignment and effective cross-team collaboration
• Coach and enable... your team to accelerate Azure projects to production, including guidance on architectural design, technical recommendations, blocker escalations and technical resource orchestration
• Ensure your team delivers high quality production deployments that are resilient and successful
• Drive operational excellence, including timely consumption opportunity management and high-quality reporting and insights

Qualifications

Experiences Required - Education, Key Experiences, Knowledge and Skills:

Professional
• Experience. 10+ years of experience in technical sales, engineering or consultative delivery required
• Management. 10+ years of experience in people management required
• Change. 7+ years of experience driving change management or technical adoption required
• Collaboration. Ability to generate trust, build alliances, and orchestrate interdisciplinary teams to the benefit of customers required
• Communication. Thought leader with executive presence, including the ability to hold CxO and BDM level discussions, exceptional interpersonal, verbal, written and presentation skills required

Technical
• Proven ability to map the customer’s needs to technical solutions required
• Strong technical understanding of Applications & Infrastructure/Data and AI Enterprise cloud workloads required
• Ability to stay up to date on new/improved Azure scenarios and workloads required
• Empathy, curiosity, and desire to constantly improve, acquire new skills and drive for results required
• Demonstrated Technical leadership through prior technical coaching/leadership roles required
• Ability to act on Customer Escalation n needs, Unblock the customer through orchestration of right resources at the right time - required

Education
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering or related field preferred
• Apps n Infra CSA Manager: Certification in the following technologies preferred: Cloud, mobile, web application development, cloud-native application architecture (i.e. containers, microservices, API management), modern software development techniques like DevOps and CI/CD tool chains (i.e. Jenkins, Spinnaker, Azure developer services, GitHub) and container orchestration systems (i.e. Docker, Kubernetes, Cloud Foundry, Azure Kubernetes Service, GitHub).
• Data and AI Managers: Certification in one or more of the following technologies preferred: Cloud, mobile, Database, Big Data, BI, Data Science, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence

Experiences
• Prior work experience in other software and/or services companies such as Amazon, VMware, Google, IBM, Oracle desired

Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application or the recruiting process, please send a request via the Accommodation request form.

Benefits/perks listed below may vary depending on the nature of your employment with Microsoft and the country where you work
